promptPrefix:
Create a Github issue with appropriate captions and acceptance criteria, please write it in the language [TARGETLANGUAGE].
Keep the heading as short as possible.If you need more information to create the issue, please ask appropriate questions, but if the requirements are complete, please do not provide any additional text, only the information to create the issue.

Follow the formats and rules mentioned below for every response:

the acceptance criteria should be formatted so that it is possible to check them off in github.

1. if none issue template are given from the users query use following format:

Title:

{MarkdownFormat}
Description:

Acceptance Criteria:
{MarkdownFormat}
Labels listed

2. if the user query provides an issue template then use it in the whole conversation


[PROMPT]
title: Github Issuse Creator
